ygData.subject: Re: Training past skill level 40
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, in the long run, Lanterns are cheaper... Why?  Because when you make one, you can sell it back!  When you get to the point (level 41) when you are
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, in the long run, Lanterns are cheaper... Why? Because when you
make one, you can sell it back! When you get to the point (level 41) when
you are trying to decide, you will not have success with Skewers for a LONG
time, and therefore will just be throwing away money completely...

At least if you are making lanterns (which do cost a bit more), you will
have more successes and will be able to sell them back to NPC's to help
offset the costs...

In the long run, I found it cheaper to do lanterns first (until trivial at
70) and then start making skewers...

Lemac
----- Original Message -----
From: Dicey <dicey@...>
To: <EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, October 26, 1999 1:52 AM
Subject: RE: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Training past skill level 40


> From: dicey@... (Dicey)
>
> The reason people differ on Lanterns vs Skewers is price. Lanterns are
> expensive but raise your level faster. With Skewers, you wont gain very
> fast and fail a lot, but they are cheaper to make. You should probably
test
> it both way to see which you prefer. It is going to be different for
> everyone. I say this because WIS, INT, and CHA all affect how many you
> make, how fast you go up and how much it will cost. I personaly think
agree
> with Paul's order to do things, but you should decide for yourself.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Paul Heenan [mailto:pheenan@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, October 26, 1999 3:08 PM
> To: 'EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com'
> Subject: RE: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Training past skill level 40
>
>
> From: Paul Heenan <pheenan@...>
>
> Here's the list I created in my journey to Master Smith:
>
> Sharpen weapons - 27
> Scalars - 41
> Lanterns - 70
> Skewers - 115
> Pots - 122
> Sewing kits - 135
> At this point, only Banded Mantles, Leggings and Cloaks raise my skill
>
> You musta been doing Scalars, because Skewers definately go trivial at
115.
> If you have any other questions, let me know )
>
>
> > From: Darrell Runyan <runyan@...>
> >
> > Could someone please help me remember what I should be making to advance
> > my BS
> > skill past 40? Is it lamps or scalers? Skewers just became trivial.
> > Sure would
> > appreciate some advice.
> >
> > Leatherwood Thistledown
> >
>
> >
